com.syntax.manage

Interface AbstractCodeAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCodeAdapter, JavaCodeAdapter

    public interface AbstractCodeAdapter
    This abstact class support APIs to design personal syntax attribute of SyntaxTextArea. There are three abstract methods needed to be implemented. For more details, see methods' descriptions.
    See Also:
    SyntaxTextArea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.text.AttributeSet getDefaultAttributeSet()
      SyntaxTextArea get attribute from this method to colour text before it call insertString
      void insertString(int offset, java.lang.String text, SyntaxTextArea textArea)
      When text is inserted into SyntaxTextArea, it will send notification through this method
      void remove(int offset, java.lang.String text, SyntaxTextArea textArea)
      When text is removed from SyntaxTextArea, it will send notification through this method
      boolean replace(int offset, int length, java.lang.String text, SyntaxTextArea textArea)
      Replace text on SyntaxTextArea

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultAttributeSet

        javax.swing.text.AttributeSet getDefaultAttributeSet()
        SyntaxTextArea get attribute from this method to colour text before it call insertString
        Returns:
        the default attribute of paragraph

      • insertString

        void insertString(int offset,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  SyntaxTextArea textArea)
        When text is inserted into SyntaxTextArea, it will send notification through this method
        Parameters:
        offset - the index where the text was inserted. If the location is the head of paragraph, offset will be 0. If the location is the end of paragraph, offset will be the length of paragraph before text inserted
        text - the specified string which is instered to paragraph
        textArea - registered syntax text area
        See Also:
        SyntaxTextArea

      • remove

        void remove(int offset,
            java.lang.String text,
            SyntaxTextArea textArea)
        When text is removed from SyntaxTextArea, it will send notification through this method
        Parameters:
        offset - the index where the text was removed. If the first character at the head of paragraph, offset will be 0
        text - the text which is removed from paragraph
        textArea - registered syntax text area

      • replace

        boolean replace(int offset,
                int length,
                java.lang.String text,
                SyntaxTextArea textArea)
        Replace text on SyntaxTextArea
        Parameters:
        offset - the start position of replacement
        length - the length of replacement
        text - replace the text in [offset, offset + length) with text
        textArea - registered syntax text area
        Returns:
        true to make SyntaxTextArea replace text through remove() and insertString() in sequence. false to make SyntaxTextArea do nothing
